description: As the last days of summer play out, these three are looking to make the most of what's left of the sun. It's a triple play weekend for Carter Woods, Johnny B and Ryan Jordan. After cooling off in the pool, the get hot and steamy upstairs in the bedroom as the three of them indulge in all of their raunchy desires. They pass Johnny around like a party favor before taking turns shooting their loads, and this is one party where everyone can cum!Enjoy!

title: Three Play
